strIntroduction: It has been selected as the cheapest transportation option to travel around Tokyo! Depending which Day Pass is being purchased, you have up to 24-72 hours’ access and the time (shown on the pass) will only begin from your first trip.
strTitle: 【Unlimited Access】Tokyo Metro 1-Day/2-Day/3-Day Pass

strIntroduction: 搭乘巴士前往長崎地區最著名的景點！半日遊日文導覽巴士。
strTitle: 長崎好玩巴士行程《每天出發》玩遍長崎必看景點

strIntroduction: 太宰府、柳川都是充滿日式傳統風情的景點，如果能穿上和服拍照就更完美了？OK沒問題！這個和服出租方案保證完成你的心願噢！
strTitle: 〖九州福岡〗柳川・太宰府　打扮成和服女孩坐小舟遊水鄉

strIntroduction: 豪斯登堡三大品質保證飯店！獨具荷蘭文藝氣息、設施獨特且多樣化，絕對帶給您不一樣的日式歐洲度假氛圍！！
strTitle: 《豪斯登堡住宿》阿姆斯特丹大飯店Hotel Amsterdam 4人住宿（設計師房型／禁煙）

strIntroduction: Do you want adventure for the entire family? This safe and exciting family rafting trip on the Saru River is perfect for you!
strTitle: Family Water Fun - Cruise on Hokkaido's White Water with the Entire Family

strIntroduction: In this program, you will experience a special Chanko (hot pot) dinner with Sumo wrestler in Asakusa.
strTitle: Chanko dinner with Sumo Wrestler in Asakusa

strIntroduction: Begin an old-style Kyoto journey with the opportunity to enjoy Gion Maiko performances as well as experiencing a traditional Kyoto feast!
strTitle: 【Night Sightseeing Bus】Traditional Kyoto Feast & Maiko Performances & Stunning Kyoto night view in one go!

strIntroduction: 千呼萬喚始出來！響應眾多旅客許願，JR推出自由行旅客最愛的中部地區周遊券囉 下呂溫泉、高山老街、黑部立山、松本城，眾多超夯景點一票皆可達！
strTitle: 【JR PASS】阿爾卑斯、高山、松本地區周遊券

strIntroduction: Bar hopping master will take you to the bars in Ueno where local Japanese people come for drinking. Enjoy the local Japanese night life!
strTitle: Local Bar Hopping experience in Ueno with BAR Hopping Master!

strIntroduction: NISSAN日產租車線上預約！KKday為您提供最優質的租車服務。安心・舒適・整潔。不管是朋友、情侶還是家族旅遊都適合。行程不受限，盡情暢遊日本中部地區、名古屋！
strTitle: 《日產》中部NISSAN租車・RV1休旅5人座

strIntroduction: 來到向日葵的種植面積為全日本第一的北龍町，我們帶你看滿山滿海的向日葵，最後再帶你去泡正宗的日本溫泉！
strTitle: 【百萬株向日葵綻放】探訪北龍町向日葵祭（含新篠津溫泉）

strIntroduction: Let the most heated game of the century in Baseball history begin! Nippon-Ham Fighters VS Chiba Lotte Marines. Watch this season’s match between both teams to see how the game unfolds, not once, not twice, but thrice!
strTitle: 【NPB】Hokkaido Nippon-ham Fighters VS Chiba Lotte Marines

strIntroduction: 「東映太秦映畫村」有眾多體驗設施，是全家大小一起出遊的首選，kkday貼心的為您搭配了映畫村門票＋嵐電套票組合，方便又超值！
strTitle: 〖京都〗江戶時代劇映畫村＋嵐電超值套票

strIntroduction: Only a stone thrown away from Okinawa main island, blessed with white sand beaches, plenty of marine life and clear warm water, Japan's "Angel's Island" is a great place for your first diving experience!
strTitle: Snorkeling and Introductory Dive at Minnajima

strIntroduction: 浅草（スカイツリー）や両国・浜離宮恩賜庭園などの景色を隅田川に掛かるいくつのも橋をくぐりながら眺める、観光にピッタリのプラン。春は隅田川沿いに咲く桜もご覧いただくことができます。
strTitle: 隅田川の周遊観光プラン

strIntroduction: In this program, you will experience a special Chanko (hot pot) dinner with Sumo wrestler in Ryogoku.
strTitle: Chanko dinner with Sumo Wrestler in Ryogoku

strIntroduction: Takayama - Hokuriku Tourist Pass would be the best choice for you to travel around Japan word heritage！
strTitle: 【JR PASS】Takayama - Hokuriku Tourist Pass

strIntroduction: Get one card then you can go through out Kansai Area!! Receive a free guidebook (map included) in English, Chinese, Korean language.
strTitle: KANSAI THRU PASS (2-day / 3-day)

strIntroduction: Discover Okinawa's real beauty while paddling around in a kayak! Float around Yadokari Island and snorkel around coral reef! KKday and SEASIR take you on a fun kayaking adventure.
strTitle: Okinawa Sea Fun - Relaxing Kayaking Trip at Yadokari Island

strIntroduction: Although shapes of car and ceramics are unlike ,it is a industry that Japan does it the best.In its basic,science and design are exhausted calculated to detail, technology to link it to the actual product, responsible for it.It is a craftsman spirit. And traditions beyond this hundred years, it is the tour over the cutting edge.
strTitle: Toyota Industry Memorial & Noritake Of Forest Tour

strIntroduction: Enjoy traveling on the Shinkansen between Tokyo and Shin-Hakodate-Hokuto. When traveling around Japan, the JR East-South Hokkaido Rail Pass is too good to pass up!
strTitle: 【JR PASS】East-South Hokkaido Rail Pass

strIntroduction: KKday帶你前往「東洋第一洞」玉泉洞的未開放地區....當眼前被晶瑩剔透的新生鐘乳石包圍，彷彿夢幻一般異世界的光景，一定會讓你驚嘆不虛此行！ 【KKday預約獨家贈送】沖繩王化王國自助餐吃到飽餐廳10%OFF優惠券！各種沖繩料理甜點巧克力噴泉吃到飽！
strTitle: 【完全預約制】夏季限定！沖繩玉泉洞未公開路線洞窟探險

strIntroduction: 登上沖繩聖地－久高島，探索你所不知的沖繩！
strTitle: 【沖繩】日本最後的聖地－走訪久高島

strIntroduction: 這個夏天就是要跳島！你絕對不能錯過在Tripadviosr日本十大最美海灘囊括了其中3名的「宮古島藍」。宮古島是享受各種地形變化的潛水聖地，2015年4月啟用的日本最長免收費大橋「伊良部大橋」，去過一次保證終身難忘。
strTitle: 【沖繩離島機加酒】夏季限定！航班自選宮古島3天2夜自由行

strIntroduction: KKday aims to provide you with the best Rent-a-Car service! It is highly recommended if you're planning to have a laid-back and relax Okinawa trip with your friends, family or other half!
strTitle: [KKday Only]Peak Season．A Class 5-Seater Car Rental in Okinawa

strIntroduction: 人氣景點鳳梨園回來了！沖繩旅遊絕不容錯過的Hip-Hop bus，新路線上架！走遍沖繩4大景點，吃喝玩樂一次滿足！車上提供8國語音導覽以及免費wifi，超優惠觀光巴士你一定要來體驗！
strTitle: 【人氣景點鳳梨園】Hip-Hop觀光巴士B路線・載你搖擺沖繩去！
